headers.subject: [tosdr:1962] Other Tumblr users can use your custom themes

html:
Note also that other Subscribers may use your Custom Themes after you have removed them from distribution, and you hereby grant those Subscribers an irrevocable license to use those Custom Themes as contributed by you. In other words, you can remove and stop distribution of your Custom Themes, but Subscribers who are already using them can keep using them.

http://www.tumblr.com/policy/en/terms_of_service 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---
You received this message because you are subscribed to the Google Groups "Terms of Service; Didn't Read" group.

subject: Other Tumblr users can use your custom themes
text:
>
> Note also that other Subscribers may use your Custom Themes after you have 
> removed them from distribution, and you hereby grant those Subscribers an 
> irrevocable license to use those Custom Themes as contributed by you. In 
> other words, you can remove and stop distribution of your Custom Themes, 
> but Subscribers who are already using them can keep using them.


http://www.tumblr.com/policy/en/terms_of_service 

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
